You can configure Mevenide through the 'Maven' Preferences page : Window > Preferences > Maven. Java Home, Maven Home and Maven repository are required in order to successfully use Mevenide. However as for now you should not have anything to do since convenient values should be automatically filled (grabbed from environment variables, ~/build.properties, etc.)
Also a POM template can be specified that will be used when creating POM skeleton. This preference will be removed later in favour of the 'Templates' preferences page.
Last, you can specify default goals which will be run when invoking the runner. Default is test:test. Default is useful to support one-click launching.
Screenshot 1 Mevenide Preferences Page

Mevenide actions can be accessed through the 'Maven' menu in either project.xml or Eclipse Project contextual menu.
